name: Poster Girl!
description:
"Poster Girl!" lets you easily create cool looking posters with any image.

Apply poster and art effects to your own photos. Transform them instantly into amazing posters Warhol style. You'll create a fabulous poster every time.

"Poster Girl!" features a straightforward and streamlined interface. Toggle between black & white and color to add beautiful effects. Choose from an array of paper textured backgrounds. Adjust the poster effect, background and color to create unique effects.

And once you've created your perfect Poster, you can choose from a wide selection of Brush Strokes to creatively paint your Poster, for that personal custom effect.

It's fun and easy to turn yourself or any image into an awesome Poster!

*** All screenshots were created using this app ***
